title: No train service from Yew Tee to Bukit Gombak due to track fault

updates.text: [NSL] CLEARED: Train service between Woodland and Jurong East has resumed. Free regular bus service has ceased.
[NSL]:Due to congestion,estimate 10mins additional travel time between WDL & JUR.Free regular bus is still available between WDL & JUR.
[NSL]:UPDATED:Due to congestion,estimate 20mins add travel time between WDL & JUR.Free regular bus is still available between WDL & JUR.
[NSL]:Please expect additional 20mins travel time between WDL & JUR due to earlier fault.Free regular bus is available between WDL & JUR.
[NSL]:Due to congestion,estimate 20mins additional travel time between WDL & JUR.Free regular bus is still available between WDL & JUR.
[NSL]:Due to congestion,estimate 20mins additional travel time between WDL & JUR.Free regular bus is available between WDL & JUR.
[NSL]:Fault cleared but trains & stations are still crowded.Due to congestion,estimate 20mins additional travel time between WDL & JUR.
[NSL]:Fault cleared but trains & stations are still crowded.Due to congestion,estimate 15mins additional travel time between WDL & JUR.
[NSL]Update:Free regular bus still available btw YewTee & JurongEast.Trains will traveling at slower speed due to earlier fault @ NSLine.
[NSL]Update:Due to earlier track fault,trains will be traveling @ slower speed.Free regular bus still available between YewTee & JurongEast.
[NSL]Update:Trains are moving at a slower speed between Choa Chu Kang and Bukit Gombak.Free regular bus service is still available.
[NSL] CLEARED :Train service between #YewTee and #BukitGombak has resumed. Free regular bus service is still available.
[NSL]: No train service from #YewTee to #BukitGombak due to track fault until 6:15AM.Free bus service is available.
